definition: archaic variant of 蘇|苏[su1]/to revive
Ascension Day (Christian festival forty days after Easter)
The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
pinyin: Ye1 su1 Ji1 du1 Hou4 qi1 Sheng4 tu2 Jiao4 hui4
containing_words.word: 耶穌基督後期聖徒教會

definition: The Church of Jesus Christ of Latter-day Saints
pinyin: Ye1 su1 Ji1 du1 Mo4 shi4 Sheng4 tu2 Jiao4 hui4
containing_words.word: 耶穌基督末世聖徒教會

definition: a Jesuit/member of Society of Jesus
Advent (Christian period of 4 weeks before Christmas)

sentences.english: Who speaks words that are lovelier than those of Jesus?
sentences.chinese: 有誰說的話比耶穌更動聽？

sentences.english: But He perceived their craftiness and said to them.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌看出他們的詭詐，就對他們說。

sentences.english: Had Jesus not died on the cross, Christianity would not have triumphed.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌要是不死在十字架上，基督教就無法取得勝利。

sentences.english: The NT testifies about Jesus Christ who has already come .
But Jesus made no reply, not even to a single charge--to the great amazement of the governor.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌仍不回答，連一句話也不說，以致巡撫甚覺希奇。

sentences.english: Sitting at his toll booth one day, the publican saw Jesus approaching.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，馬太坐在稅關上，看見耶穌向他走來。

sentences.english: Christians believe Jesus Christ was buried where the Church of the Holy Sepulchre now stands in Jerusalem.
sentences.chinese: 基督徒們相信耶穌基督就是被葬在了這座聖墓教堂下。

sentences.english: If you serve like Jesus, you can expect to be criticized.
sentences.chinese: 假若你像耶穌那樣地服事，必然會受到批評。

sentences.english: And he answered him to never a word; insomuch that the governor marvelled greatly.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌仍不回答，連一句話也不說，以致巡撫甚覺希奇。

sentences.english: Jesus' day, farmers didn't have tractors or planters.
sentences.chinese: 在耶穌的時代，農夫沒有拖拉機和播種機。

sentences.english: This Jesus hath God raised up, whereof we all are witnesses.
sentences.chinese: 這耶穌，神已經叫他復活了，我們都爲這事作見證。

sentences.english: But Jesus bowing himself down, wrote with his finger on the ground.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌卻彎下身去，用指頭在地上畫字。

sentences.english: Jesus did this with the Apostle Peter.
sentences.chinese: 主耶穌也是這樣鼓勵使徒彼得。

sentences.english: This lesson says that Jesus is the "firstfruits" from the dead.
sentences.chinese: 這說明了耶穌就是從死裏而來的初熟的果子。

sentences.english: Now about the midst of the feast Jesus went up into the temple, and taught.
sentences.chinese: 到了節期，耶穌上殿裏去教訓人。

sentences.english: Jesus replied, "The one who has dipped his hand into the bowl with me will betray me.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌回答說，同我蘸手在盤子裏的，就是他要賣我。

definition: archaic variant of 蘇|苏[su1]/to revive
Jehovah (biblical name for God, Hebrew: YHWH)/compare Yahweh 雅威[Ya3 wei1] and God 上帝[Shang4 di4]
